title: PROPERTY LOAN (FINANCE) Chennai City Properties. PERSONALLOAN AT CHENNAI (Salaried) - CIBIL / DEFAULT CASE) .T & C Apply. .in - Chennai
content:
Description We ARRANGE BANK & PRIVATE FINANCE
1.PERSONAL LOAN / SICK UNIT / Corporate / Building / Vacant Land. 2. Employees - who draw minimum salary of Rs.10,000/-PM.
3. Personal Loan available only for CHENNAI based salaried people 4. Residential status – Own (OR) Rental.
Also we arrange Loan on;
We also offer a) Loan consultation for CIBIL & DEFAULT and NPA / DRD cases. b) Individuals who stays in MANSIONS (OR) LADIES HOSTEL can also avail this opportunity.
c) Short-term Emergency Loans against Chennai city properties.
We also arrange; Finance against Chennai city properties .To avoid auction due to N.P.A. Also for SICK UNIT – COMPANY / FACTORY (Financial Problem).
WITH INCOME PROOF (property Based)
We arrange finance all over tamilnadu Main City.Minimum amount Rs.10 crore To 250 crore. Kindly share (forward) the details to your (FACEBOOK – Like `TRIPLEKCHENNAI ` in Facebook & Share) Friends & Relatives; It might be a Timely Help for FINANCIAL (Crisis / EMERGENCIES) need.(For School,Collage fees;Medical;Pregnancy;Aged People;Credit Card Due., Etc…)
If my mobile is not reachable /call is not attended, Please do SMS your details; we shall call you back..
